ground_truth.thought: 我正在考虑通过债券投资来稳定退休收入。首先，获取关于债券投资的最新分析报告5篇。然后，查询过去十年内主要债券的收益率数据。接着，获取当前债券市场的实时数据。最后，通过债券投资分析工具，给出适合退休人士的债券投资建议。
ground_truth.name: PolygonFinance.get_bond_analysis

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_bond_analysis', 'description': 'Get the latest bond investment analysis reports.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The query term for bond investment analysis'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'reports', 'description': 'A list of the latest bond investment analysis reports'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_bond_yield_data', 'description': 'Get historical bond yield data for the past decade.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'yield_data', 'description': 'Historical bond yield data for the past 10 years'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_bond_market_data', 'description': 'Get real-time data for the bond market.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'market_data', 'description': 'Real-time data for the bond market'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_retirement_bond_recommendations', 'description': 'Get bond investment recommendations suitable for retirees.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'recommendations', 'description': 'Bond investment recommendations for retirees'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
